memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *model, NDDataType_t dataType, int numbuffs, int debug, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: QImage

briefdescription.para: QImage::QImage Class constructor.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
The initial data type (NDDataType_t) of the images that this driver will create.
The number of frames to hold in the circular buffer.
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.

briefdescription.para: QImage::writeInt32: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquire, ADColorMode, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks.
pasynUser
Structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write

briefdescription.para: QImage::writeFloat64: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquireTime, ADGain, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks.
pasynUser
Structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: QImage::report.

memberdef.argsstring: (asynUser *pasynUser, char *strings[], int values[], int severities[], size_t nElements, size_t *nIn)
memberdef.name: readEnum

briefdescription.para: QImage::readEnum: Adds frame data type and color mode to enums.
QImage::consumerTask: Thread function to accept new frames from the detector and push them down the pipeline.
QImage::frameTask: Thread function for generating software triggers for the detector.
QImage::shutdown: Function called at IOC exit.
QImage::pushCollectedFrame: Pushes an aquired frame to a queue to be proecssed by consumer thread.
QImage::setExposureDone: Call signal when exposure happened on the detector.

memberdef.argsstring: (void *usrPtr, unsigned long frameId, QCam_Err errorcode, unsigned long flags)
memberdef.name: QImageCallback

briefdescription.para: Callback function from the detector when a frame or exposure occur.
QImage::resultCode: Checks the result code from QIMAGE api functions.
QImage::connectQImage: connect to the detector.
QImage::disconnectQImage: Called during shutdown to disconnect from the detector.
QImage::initializeQImage: Init function called at detector reset.
QImage::queryQImageSettings: Queries properties from the detector.

inbodydescription.para: range parameter types offset region of interest intensifier gain trigger delay normalized gain normalized intensifier gain absolute offset
sparse parameter types cooling readout speed shutter state sync b mode binning trigger type image format color wheel camera mode

briefdescription.para: QImage::initializeFrames: Init frame buffers.
QImage::resetFrameQueues: Clear out the frame buffer queue.
QImage::getCameraInfo: Queries properties from the detector.
QImage::q_acquire : called when aquire is pressed.
QImage::q_setTriggerMode: Sets the detector trigger mode.
QImage::q_autoExposure: Call auto exposure on the detector.
QImage::q_whiteBalance: Call white balance function on the detector.
QImage::q_setDataTypeAndColorMode: Set detector frame data type and color mode.
QImage::q_setImageSize: Sets the image size.
QImage::q_setBinning: Sets the detector binning.
QImage::q_setMinXY: Sets the image min x.
QImage::q_resetCamera: Reset the detector.
QImage::q_setTemperature: Set temp on the detector cooler.
QImage::q_setCoolerActive: Activate or deactivate the cooler.
QImage::q_setReadoutSpeed: Change the readout speed.
QImage::allocFrame: Allocate a single frame buffer.
QImage::releaseFrame: Free frame buffer data.
